text: 1560 (MDLX) was a leap year starting on Monday in the Julian calendar and a leap year starting on Friday in the proleptic Gregorian calendar. == Events == *July 6 – Treaty of Edinburgh == Births == * Anton Praetorius, fighter against torture and chase of witches (d. 1613) * August 7 – Elizabeth Báthory, Hungarian murderer * November 28 – Baltasar of Marradas, Spanish noblemanbleman, knight of the Knights of Malta, imperial field marshal, governor in Bohemia (d. 1638) == Deaths == *April 19 – Philipp Melanchthon, German humanist and reformer *September 29 – King Gustav I of Sweden (b. 1496)
